newsitem.title: FRANCE: French forecaster OFCE sees 2.5 pct GDP 97 growth.
newsitem.headline: French forecaster OFCE sees 2.5 pct GDP 97 growth.

text.p: Private French forecaster OFCE is forecasting gross domestic product growth of 2.5 percent for 1997 and 3.1 percent for 1998, the OFCE (Observatoire Francais des Conjonctures Economiques) said on Tuesday.
It said in a report on the economic outlook that companies were still showing a great deal of caution, but recovery could be consolidated through external demand.

It saw consumer spending rising by 1.3 percent in 1997 and by 2.1 percent in 1998, while it forecast unemployment would edge up to 12.9 percent at the end of this year, compared to a record 12.8 percent now, and fall to 12.6 percent at the end of next year.
The government says it expects growth of at least 2.3 percent in 1997 after 1.3 percent last year.
